attributes.action: Reverse the trend of erosion of civil liberties under Mr Blair.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Since 1997 too many people have been wrongly arrested under authoritarian laws introduced by the Labour Government in the name of "fighting terror." I propose the government should repeal the laws before we lose the fundamental rights that made and make Britain today. This petition also proposes scrapping ID Cards and the overuse of CCTV.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
